birth_place.zh-cn: 河南省固始县武庙集乡锁口村
birth_place.en: Suokou Village, Wumiaoji Township, Gushi County, Henan Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任湖北省副省长、中共中央顾问委员会委员。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Governor of Hubei Province and a member of the Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省信阳市下辖县，是夏世厚的出生地。
description.en: A county under the administration of Xinyang City, Henan Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Xia Shihou.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在土地革命战争时期创立的农民武装。
description.en: A peasant armed force established by the Communist Party of China during the Agrarian Revolutionary War.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国内革命战争时期领导的人民军队。
description.en: The people's army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国内革命战争时期，中国工农红军主力从长江南北各苏区向陕甘苏区撤退和转移的事件。
description.en: The strategic retreat and transfer of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army from the Soviet areas south and north of the Yangtze River to the Shaanxi-Gansu Soviet area during the Second Revolutionary Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: Refers to the war of resistance fought by China against a full-scale invasion by Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

en: 129th Division of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 八路军的主力师之一，在抗日战争期间夏世厚曾在此任职。
description.en: One of the main divisions of the Eighth Route Army, where Xia Shihou served during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 新四军在豫鄂地区的部队，夏世厚曾在此任职。
description.en: A unit of the New Fourth Army in the Henan-Hubei region, where Xia Shihou served.

en: 5th Division of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 新四军的主力师之一，夏世厚曾在此任职。
description.en: One of the main divisions of the New Fourth Army, where Xia Shihou served.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次主要武装冲突。
description.en: The second major armed conflict between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China that took place within China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期设立的军区之一。
description.en: One of the military regions established by the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期设立的军区之一。
description.en: One of the military regions established by the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的一支主要野战部队。
description.en: A major field army of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在湖北省设立的军事机构。
description.en: A military organization established by the People's Liberation Army in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省政府主管农业的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Hubei Provincial Government of the People's Republic of China responsible for agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间湖北省的权力机构。
description.en: The organ of power in Hubei Province during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的中华人民共和国中国共产党中央组织机构，作为废除干部领导职务终身制的过渡性组织。
description.en: A central organization of the Communist Party of China in the People's Republic of China, established from 1982 to 1992 as a transitional organization for the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 夏世厚早年参加农民赤卫军。
description.en: Xia Shihou joined the Peasants' Red Guards in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 夏世厚早年参加中国工农红军。
description.en: Xia Shihou joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army in his early years.

position.zh-cn: 第七十三师营政治委员、交通队队长
position.en: Battalion Political Commissar of the 73rd Division, Captain of the Traffic Team

description.zh-cn: 夏世厚曾任红二十五军第七十三师营政治委员、红二十五军交通队队长。
description.en: Xia Shihou served as the Battalion Political Commissar of the 73rd Division of the Red 25th Army and the Captain of the Traffic Team of the Red 25th Army.

description.zh-cn: 夏世厚参加了长征。
description.en: Xia Shihou participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，夏世厚担任八路军129师686团1营营长。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Xia Shihou served as the commander of the 1st Battalion, 686th Regiment, 129th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，夏世厚担任新四军豫鄂挺进纵队第二团一营营长。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Xia Shihou served as the commander of the 1st Battalion, 2nd Regiment of the New Fourth Army's Henan-Hubei Advance Column.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，夏世厚担任新四军第五师第13旅第37团团长。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Xia Shihou served as the commander of the 37th Regiment, 13th Brigade, 5th Division of the New Fourth Army.

position.en: Commander of the 37th Regiment, 13th Brigade, 2nd Column

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，夏世厚担任中原军区二纵第13旅第37团团长。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Xia Shihou served as the commander of the 37th Regiment, 13th Brigade, 2nd Column of the Central Plains Military Region.

position.en: Deputy Commander of the 2nd Military Sub-district

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，夏世厚升任鄂豫陕军区第二军分区副司令员。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Xia Shihou was promoted to Deputy Commander of the 2nd Military Sub-district of the Hubei-Henan-Shaanxi Military Region.

position.en: Deputy Commander of the 34th Brigade, 12th Column

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，夏世厚担任晋冀鲁豫野战军十二纵第34旅副旅长。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Xia Shihou served as the Deputy Commander of the 34th Brigade, 12th Column of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Field Army.

position.en: Commander of the Daye Military Sub-district

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，夏世厚担任湖北军区大冶军分区司令员。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Xia Shihou served as the Commander of the Daye Military Sub-district of the Hubei Military District.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，夏世厚改任湖北省农业厅厅长。
description.en: In 1950, Xia Shihou was reassigned as the Director of the Hubei Provincial Department of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 1962年，夏世厚升任湖北省副省长。
description.en: In 1962, Xia Shihou was promoted to Vice Governor of Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，夏世厚任湖北省革命委员会副主任。
description.en: In 1973, Xia Shihou served as the Vice Chairman of the Hubei Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

relationships.target: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 1980年，夏世厚改任湖北省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: In 1980, Xia Shihou was reassigned as the Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 夏世厚后选任中顾委委员。
description.en: Xia Shihou was later elected as a member of the Central Advisory Commission.
